A total of 17.6 billion roubles have already been sent to the city of Volj

Sergei Borodin♪23.01.2024 at 14:430
17.6 billion roubles of planned 22 billion roubles have already been allocated to infrastructure and social development in the city of Volj. This was reported by Andrei Bocharov, head of the Volgograd region, during a meeting of the Volge Development Council, which was held...
Find out more.

Vladimir Glukhov, President of the Public Chamber of the Voljsky

Darya Iveleva♪23.01.2024 at 13:030
Vladimir Nikolayevich Glukhov was elected new President of the Public Chamber of the Voljsky. This decision was taken at the first meeting of the Public Chamber of the City in 2024, which was held on 22 January. Vladimir Nikolaevich Glukhov is a former member of the City Duma, long...

The objectives of improving the quality of life of the Wizard, which will focus on joint efforts by local and regional authorities, have been identified by the head of the Volgograd region, Andrei Bocharov. This was a matter of intermediate outcomes and prospects for work at the Council meeting on...

9 holidays and many holidays in February 2024 await Russian residents

Sergei Borodin♪23.01.2024 at 11:030
In February, Russia celebrates two popular holidays. One of them is Father's Day, which celebrates the 23rd, and the other is all in love on February 14th. The Volgograd region also celebrates the Day...
Find out more.

Andrei Turchak: The PSB Working Group sent a first year report to the President

Michael Potapov♪23.01.2024 at 09:370
The group ' s representatives have worked on over 42,000 referrals from the PTS and their loved ones, approved a single standard of regional support measures, and a comprehensive system of assistance to the fighters has been established at the legislative level, and a report has been sent to the President by the PSB Working Group ...
Find out more.

The dry law will be enacted in Tatiyanin on 25 January in Volzh and Volgograd

Sergei Borodin♪22.01.2024 in 19:060
On 25 January, a retail sale of alcoholic beverages, including beer, will be prohibited throughout the Volgograd region. The only way to buy alcohol in the region on 25 January is in a hospital, a cafe or restaurant, reports...
Find out more.

The QR-codes will be able to assist with national projects

Sergei Borodin♪22.01.2024 at 18:030
The residents of the Voljsky through QR-codes will be able to assess the status of schools, hospitals and other socially important facilities. By the end of 2024, they will be on over 6,000 objects that operate within the framework of the Nazi projects, reported to the machine...
Find out more.

The Volgograd Region will have a week of social support

Michael Potapov♪22.01.2024 at 12:560
The thematic receptions for the inhabitants of the region on social support are scheduled from 5 to 9 February 2024 for residents of the Volgograd region to ask questions from the " One Russia " . The admissions will be conducted by the deputies of the State Duma,
Find out more.

The Volgograd region demonstrated the achievements of the construction complex at the Rosia exhibition

Sergei Borodin♪22.01.2024 at 12:390
The Volgograd Region presented its achievements in the construction industry as part of the Construction Day and FCC at the Rossia Exhibition at the NDA. The stand of the region visited Head of Minstro Irek Faizulin, and he also made a memorable photograph with a copy of the sculpture called Rodina Mother...
Find out more.

Vitaly Orlov was appointed new prosecutor of the Voljsky

Sergei Borodin♪22.01.2024 at 12.010
Human resources changes have taken place in the Public Prosecutor ' s Office of the Volgograd Region. Vitaly Jurievich Orlov, Senior Justice Adviser, was appointed as the new prosecutor of the city of Volj. Previously, he was the head of the Office of Legal Statistics, Information Technology and Information Protection of the Public Prosecutor ' s Office. About that...
Find out more.
